CustomField.description: This field is optional and specifies the subject property's address. It is automatically populated with the Property Address populated on the Collateral Mgmt record associated to the Service Mgmt.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is optional and specifies the subject property's address. It is automatically populated with the Property Address populated on the Collateral Mgmt record associated to the Service Mgmt.
CustomField.label: Property Address
